channel.title: How many
channel.description: items are there in Runescape? are more or less than 20000? im trying to get a collection of all the lootable items for a future project.

item.title: How many
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:10, topic:408949”][quote author=xryz link=topic=510231.msg3702326#msg3702326 date=1312824542]
ok thx everyone. i was thinking some of the items that are lootable arent on the ge b/c they arent tradeable e.g. charms, tokkul

i probably should have the program i made go through every page of items alphabetically instead of brute force requesting every single item id right now my program has only got to id 5110 lol its been running for a couple hours.

i should probably stop it and implement the alphabetical request idea.
[/quote]
Well because on rsbots.net i read an the bot loaded like up to 20.2k items?

About a month or 2 ago.
EDIT

20999 items.[/quote]

so many quest items lol

Read full topic

item.title: How many
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

drubrkletern:

I think its around 20k items overall or something.

probably but like 17k of those are quest items/non-purchasable items.

xryz:

ok thx how did u find this out? jw

well on the runescape grand exchange database it has 27 catagories (a-z and other) and there is 20 items per page in each category… so i went through each category and counted pages then added leftovers then added every number up

Read full topic
